body_html:
I found that when run to save.py line 1157, the "checkpoint_prefix" variable has double slash like "checkpoint/adagrad-lr0.01-fs200-b10-u128.64.64.32//checkpoint.ckpt-6700.index"
simply replace "//" with "/" and it's worked

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/training/saver.py#L1157
body_text:
I found that when run to save.py line 1157, the "checkpoint_prefix" variable has double slash like "checkpoint/adagrad-lr0.01-fs200-b10-u128.64.64.32//checkpoint.ckpt-6700.index"
simply replace "//" with "/" and it's worked
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/training/saver.py#L1157
body:
I found that when run to save.py line 1157, the "checkpoint_prefix" variable has double slash like "checkpoint/adagrad-lr0.01-fs200-b10-u128.64.64.32//checkpoint.ckpt-6700.index"
**simply replace "//" with "/" and it's worked**

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/training/saver.py#L1157
